AQVO – O‘zbekistonda birinchi bo‘lib sif: AQVO is the leading brand in Uzbekistan that embodies quality and honesty, offering minced meat products with a new taste and modern design.
Aqvo brendi sizni yangi ta'mlarni kashf: The Aqvo brand invites you to discover new tastes. Our products provide a unique taste to each consumer through quality and an innovative approach. Aqvo is not just taste; it’s the opportunity to experience new, healthy, and halal products. Discover new taste with us and experience true quality!
Siz izlagan ta'm, sifat, poklik va o‘zga: The taste, quality, purity, and uniqueness you are looking for... All come together in 'Aqvo'!

carusel.subtitle1: Aqvo is a brand that embodies quality and honesty, presenting its products with a new taste and modern design through an innovative approach. Being the first in Uzbekistan to produce minced meat products based on the principles of high quality and honesty, Aqvo has earned the trust of its customers.
carusel.subtitle2: The Aqvo brand currently offers products made from beef, chicken, and lamb meat to consumers. Each of our products is made based on high quality, new taste, and honesty principles. Aqvo is the bright symbol of delicious and trustworthy products.
carusel.subtitle3: The Aqvo brand ensures the delivery of its products to a wide range of areas, prioritizing quality and speed. Our delivery network ensures that products reach all regions of Uzbekistan on time. Aqvo is always close to you, always reliable.
